name: Neon OverDOSe
description:
Neon OverDOSe is a puzzle game where the goal is to guide SAM, a strategically automated machine, to the POWER FLOPPY. SAM has already programmed the moves it’s going to take to get to the POWER FLOPPY and it’ll be your job to build the level! You will start with nothing on the board, and SAM will only start it’s movement protocol once there’s nothing left to be placed on the board. 

     You will need to strategically plan and take care with where you place the tiles! If your placement isn't quite where you want it, simply RIGHT CLICK on any tile to remove it. SAM will execute it’s pre-programmed movement sequence even if it sends it flying off into the void of space or into a hazardous laser beam. On top of this, SAM will only pick up the POWER FLOPPY once it’s completely finished it’s movement protocol.

     Levels 1-1 to 1-3 are designed to teach you the basics of the game as well as what each tile can do. Levels 2-1 to 2-3 are designed to challenge you and push you to the very limits. The CHAOS level is only for those with the courage to face the unknown. This game mode randomly generates levels ranging from very easy to nightmarishly unfair! If you ever find yourself completely lost, press the Escape key to restart the map or go back to the main menu.
